#summary Getting Project Source Code

Our project is hosted at http://gitorious.org/rowboat. For a more complete set of instructions, see the [http://code.google.com/p/rowboat/wiki/ConfigureAndBuild Configure and Build wiki page].

Before you download the source, you will need [http://git-scm.com/ git] and [http://source.android.com/download/using-repo repo] tools.

On an Ubuntu 8.04 host, you can do the following:

Getting git:
{{{
$ sudo apt-get install git-core
}}}

Getting repo:
{{{
$ curl http://android.git.kernel.org/repo >~/bin/repo
$ chmod a+x ~/bin/repo
}}}

You can find detailed repo installing instructions [http://source.android.com/download/using-repo here]

To download the rowboat source code:

For donut branch use:
{{{
mkdir rowboat-android-donut
cd rowboat-android-donut
repo init -u git://gitorious.org/rowboat/manifest.git
repo sync
}}}

For eclair branch use:
{{{
mkdir rowboat-android-eclair
cd rowboat-android-eclair
repo init -u git://gitorious.org/rowboat/manifest.git -m rowboat-eclair.xml
repo sync
}}}
